channel.title: Accessories on SangMyung
channel.description: Recent content in Accessories on SangMyung

item.title: Enclosure Cooling
item.description: IECEx and ATEX Certified vortex coolers for enclosure thermal management Features Cooling capacity up to 800W IECEx and ATEX Certified Cold air from compressed air Direct mount through enclosure wall Description Thermal management for electrical enclosures should be considered at the design and specification stage. While enclosure heating is relatively straightforward, cooling is more complex and may be required to either remove the heat generated by electrical components or to compensate for high ambient temperatures.

item.title: Purge System Interface Units (MIU/SIU)
item.description: IECEx, ATEX & INMETRO Ex d certified solutions for enclosure power and signal isolation. Features Global Ex d approvals Isolates low power signals and up to 32 A power Compatible with MiniPurge & SmartPurge II Aluminium construction Description Expoâ€™s Interface Units provide switching of power and signals to the pressurized enclosure, using a control signal from the purge system. This capability is required for enclosures installed in Zone 1/21 or Class I/II Div 1 hazardous locations.
